text: Is there a easy way to take screenshot of a section? Like any automated way?
in Chrome you can right click on the page, open the DevTool, hover over the div you want to make a screenshot of, right  click and select "Make Node Screenshot"
Why my section preview is not updating? I checked the path and its correct.
that is a screenshot of the section, right?
i would try giving it a different name and change the Url

Good afternoon! I have a question about HubSpot integration with PostgreSQL. I currently have an AWS RDS Postgres database and I trying to sync the data between the two. I used WorkFlow as a test but there is only the library that supports MySQL. I also see quite a few 3rd party integrations but wanting to know which you would recommend if I had to go that route. I would prefer to use the WorkFlows with Postgres instead of MySQL. Any help here would be greatly appreciated! :slightly_smiling_face:

Hi Jermaine––I work on one of those 3rd party integrations! We recently wrote a blog post explaining how our product works, to the point that you could try to implement it yourself: <https://blog.sequin.io/HubSpot-to-postgres/>

Happy to answer any specific questions you have. Sequin’s HubSpot integration is under active development––we’re working on features beyond one-way sync––and we can sync data from <https://www.sequin.io/sources|several sources besides HubSpot> as well.
Nice!!!! I tried to integrate using the trail version and it came up with a message that HubSpot does not support this…which was weird…..I will try the integration again.
Thanks for your quick reply and I will let you know how it goes…Again thanks so much, Lukas!!!!!!!

Hmm, interesting. I think that might’ve been a message about our app not being HubSpot-verified (we’re working on that, but it’s a longer process).
Feel free to DM me any error messages you see!
I just tried to access the URL from the blog you sent..
I just went to the page and I am in the right place now…will start testing the integration
